tool_description: The Shein Data API grants direct access to Shein's expansive fashion catalog and inventory data, facilitating effortless integration of up-to-date product details into applications and systems.
name: Shein(希音) Data Service
title: Shein(希音) Data Service

api_list.name: Get Search Suggestions
api_list.description: Returns a list of suggested words. This endpoint could also be used in auto-completing of search keywords. The endpoint also returns a list of categories that are associated with the words.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: The word or phrase to complete.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The `language` parameter defines the returned data language, country-dependent. Not all countries support all languages. For example, `US` has `en` (English) and `es` (Spanish). To find supported languages for a country, use `setting/get_language_list` with the two-letter country code.

api_list.name: Search Products By Keywords
api_list.description: Searches products based on given keywords and other parameters.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The `language` parameter defines the returned data language, country-dependent. Not all countries support all languages. For example, `US` has `en` (English) and `es` (Spanish). To find supported languages for a country, use `setting/get_language_list` with the two-letter country code.

required_parameters.name: currency
required_parameters.description: The `currency` parameter specifies the currency for displayed prices. Each country offers its own set of supported currencies, obtainable through `/setting/currency_list`.

required_parameters.name: keywords
required_parameters.description: Searching Keywords.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results to be retrieved. Default is 1.

optional_parameters.name: tag_ids
optional_parameters.description: Value of `tag_id` in `tags`.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Number of results per page.

optional_parameters.name: cat_id
optional_parameters.description: Shein Category Identifier. If you have a URL from the website, it's the number after the `-cat-`. For example in this url: https://www.shein.com/Baby-Girl-Hook-and-loop-Fastener-Strap-Sandals-p-`2410511`-cat-`6252`.html the category Id is `6252`.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
The `sort` parameter determines the sorting method for the results:

- `default`: The default sorting option.

- `new_arrivals`: Sorts items based on their release or arrival date, with the newest items appearing first.

- `top_rated`: Ranks items based on user ratings or reviews, with the highest-rated items appearing first.

- `most_popular`: Sorts items based on popularity.

- `price_asc`:  Sorts items in ascending order based on their price, with the lowest-priced items appearing first.

- `price_desc`: Sorts items in descending order based on their price, with the highest-priced items appearing first.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: The values of `attr_id`. For multiple values separate the Identifiers by a hyphen `-`. For example: `160_154-160_91`

api_list.name: Get Store Info
api_list.description: Returns all info about a store based in the store identifier.

required_parameters.name: currency
required_parameters.description: The `currency` parameter specifies the currency for displayed prices. Each country offers its own set of supported currencies, obtainable through `/setting/currency_list`.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The `language` parameter defines the returned data language, country-dependent. Not all countries support all languages. For example, `US` has `en` (English) and `es` (Spanish). To find supported languages for a country, use `setting/get_language_list` with the two-letter country code.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

required_parameters.name: store_code
required_parameters.description: Shein Store Identifier.

api_list.name: Translate Product Review
api_list.description: Translates a product review's text given the identifier of the review and the product spu

required_parameters.name: dest_language
required_parameters.description: The destination translation language. For a full list of languages check [this ](https://rapidapi.com/iamEvara/api/shein-Xi-Yin-data-service/tutorials/list-of-all-supported-languages) tutorial.

required_parameters.name: goods_id
required_parameters.description: Shein Item Identifier. If you have a URL from the website, it's the number after the `-p-`. For example in this url: https://www.shein.com/Baby-Girl-Hook-and-loop-Fastener-Strap-Sandals-p-`2410511`-cat-`6252`.html the item Id is `2410511`.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

required_parameters.name: comment_id
required_parameters.description: The `comment_id` returned by `/reviews/get_product_reviews_list`.

optional_parameters.name: src_language
optional_parameters.description: The review's text language, this parameter is optional. If not set it will automatically detect the language and translate it.

api_list.description: Return Tab details. For reference of the usage of this endpoint refer to [this](https://i.postimg.cc/rs12fS7q/tab-details.jpg) image.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

required_parameters.name: channelType
required_parameters.description: The value of `id` returned in `/navigation/get_all_tabs`

api_list.name: Get "Best Sellers" Products
api_list.description: Returns the best selling products of a best selling list.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The `language` parameter defines the returned data language, country-dependent. Not all countries support all languages. For example, `US` has `en` (English) and `es` (Spanish). To find supported languages for a country, use `setting/get_language_list` with the two-letter country code.

required_parameters.name: contentCarrierId
required_parameters.description: Value of `contentCarrierId` returned from `/feed/get_feed` in the `best_sellers` key.

required_parameters.name: currency
required_parameters.description: The `currency` parameter specifies the currency for displayed prices. Each country offers its own set of supported currencies, obtainable through `/setting/currency_list`.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results to be retrieved. Default is 1.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Number of results per page.

api_list.name: Get Product Feed
api_list.description: Returns the feed list.

required_parameters.name: fields
required_parameters.description: This specifies the returned feeds. Available values are `deal_goods`, `best_sellers`, and `new_goods`. For multiple values add a seperating comma `,`.

required_parameters.name: currency
required_parameters.description: The `currency` parameter specifies the currency for displayed prices. Each country offers its own set of supported currencies, obtainable through `/setting/currency_list`.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The `language` parameter defines the returned data language, country-dependent. Not all countries support all languages. For example, `US` has `en` (English) and `es` (Spanish). To find supported languages for a country, use `setting/get_language_list` with the two-letter country code.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Number of results per page.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results to be retrieved. Default is 1.

api_list.name: Get Product Reviews List
api_list.description: Returns a list of Product Reviews

required_parameters.name: goods_spu
required_parameters.description: The value of `productRelationID` returned by `/product/get_goods_details`.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The `language` parameter defines the returned data language, country-dependent. Not all countries support all languages. For example, `US` has `en` (English) and `es` (Spanish). To find supported languages for a country, use `setting/get_language_list` with the two-letter country code.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

optional_parameters.name: is_picture
optional_parameters.description: If set to `1`, only reviews with Pictures will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results to be retrieved. Default is 1.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Number of results per page.

optional_parameters.name: comment_rank
optional_parameters.description: The `comment_rank` parameter filters reviews based on their ranking, returning only those with a specified `comment_rank` value. Review rankings are on a scale from 1 to 5. If this wasn't set, it will return all reviews with all ranks.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
The `sort` parameter determines the sorting method for the results, there is three distinct options:

- `time_asc`: Sorts products in ascending order based on their timestamp.
- `time_desc`: Sorts products in descending order based on their timestamp.
- `default`: Applies the default Shein ranking.

api_list.name: Get Goods Detail Image
api_list.description: Returns list of detailed images of the product. If this endpoints returns an empty list, it means that the product doesn't have detailed images.

required_parameters.name: goods_id
required_parameters.description: Shein Item Identifier. If you have a URL from the website, it's the number after the `-p-`. For example in this url: https://www.shein.com/Baby-Girl-Hook-and-loop-Fastener-Strap-Sandals-p-`2410511`-cat-`6252`.html the item Id is `2410511`.

api_list.name: Get Goods Similar List
api_list.description: Returns a list of products that are similar to a product based on the given goods id and category id. Check [this](https://i.postimg.cc/NMM6BHHB/Screenshot-1695501624.png) image for in-app reference.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The `language` parameter defines the returned data language, country-dependent. Not all countries support all languages. required_parameters.description: The two-letter country code that corresponds to the specific geographic region for which you wish to access data. The Shein website maintains distinct data for each individual country.

required_parameters.name: goods_id
required_parameters.description: Shein Item Identifier. If you have a URL from the website, it's the number after the `-p-`. For example in this url: https://www.shein.com/Baby-Girl-Hook-and-loop-Fastener-Strap-Sandals-p-`2410511`-cat-`6252`.html the item Id is `2410511`.

optional_parameters.name: size

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results to be retrieved. Default is 1.

api_list.name: Get Language List By Country
api_list.description: The endpoint returns a list of languages that can be used in a specific site. Shein doesn't support all languages in all sites, each site has a specific set of supported languages. For example, the [US ](https://us.shein.com) site only supports Español and English.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

api_list.name: Get Country's Currency List
api_list.description: Returns a list of supported currencies by site(country). For example the [US](https://us.shein.com) site supports USD, EUR, GBP, CHF, CAD, MXN currencies.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.

api_list.name: Get Tab Node Details
api_list.description: Returns the Tab's Navigation details. This endpoint will contain the category Identifiers inside each `info -> content -> index -> thumb` key. For reference of the usage of this endpoint refer to [this](https://i.postimg.cc/RVZgs7kG/tab-nav-details.jpg) image.

required_parameters.name: navNodeId
required_parameters.description: The value of `navNodeId` in `/navigation/get_tab_details`

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The `language` parameter defines the returned data language, country-dependent. Not all countries support all languages. For example, `US` has `en` (English) and `es` (Spanish). To find supported languages for a country, use `setting/get_language_list` with the two-letter country code.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The 2-letter value of the country the data will refer to. Shein website has separate data for each country.
